name: Yoshinari Kameda
content: www.kameda-lab.org www.kameda-lab.org This site was founded on 2000/06/16. (1994/04: I made my first web page.) (2014/07/27: New Hardware has come and holds 19TB at front side.) [Japanese] What is kameda-lab.org ? Kameda laboratory on the Internet provides wide variety of information supplied by KAMEDA, Yoshinari. It looks simple, but has looooots of content (more than 400,000 pages)! Site Map Update Updated URLs This Week | Profile Official | Private | Misc. Activities | Access to Tsukuba | Research Publication | New Introduction | Old Introduction | Education Course List | HDTV lecture archive | Advisory Work | Records Photo Archive | Gate Keeper Archive | Original Music | Private Space Boston Picture Diary | National Flags | Reading | Family Emblem | Resourses Casper Cartridge (Ubuntu + OpenCV,AR,MR on USB memory) | Unofficial local guide of ICPR2012 | WWW Servers CVIM Lab (U-Tsukuba) | Minoh Lab (Kyoto-U) | Geo-USA | Senri-Issui-kai | Media Servers Video of ACCMS (a.k.a CIMS) | Web Archive Minoh Lab | Ikeda Lab | AI lab, MIT | MIT | My Alternative WWW Sites At University of Tsukuba (CVIM Lab) with Prof. Ohta, Nakamura(Y), Kameda, Mukaigawa, Kitahara) (2003/04-) At Kyoto University (Minoh Lab) with Prof. Minoh, Kakusho, Nakamura(M), Kameda, Irie, Yagi, Mizuta, Mukunoki, Nishiguchi, Rutkowski, Iiyama) (1996/04-2003/03) At Kyoto University (Ikeda Lab) with Prof. Ikeda, Minoh, Hirose, Amano) (1994/04-1999/03) kameda[at]ieee.org (representative) | kameda[at]iit.tsukuba.ac.jp (business) | kamedajpn[at]yahoo.co.jp (private)
